content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received an empty command from the user.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Human feedback: oh i understand that individuals and organizations are not obligated to do anything. that is why i was merely asking for 10-15 minutes to tell my story and if they'd want to give me the opportunity to carry out the things i want to do - that would be great. if not - all they did was spend 15 minutes listening to something they didn't happen to like or connect with. seems like a decent idea to me. as far it being difficult to provide funding for projects that are based on impulse and moment thinking - i don't think that is the case. i believe it's just a matter of listening to a story - and if i have plenty of resources i can give out and the ask is not incredibly large - such as half of what i own, or everything - then i'd see no reasons not to consider doing it. as far as reaching out to organizations and individuals that have a history of supporting similar initiatives - i am not sure such individuals or organizations exist. at least not yet, because the world doesn't seem to support this idea just yet."}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "", "args": {}}}'}]
"""
